${ModID}:Arson.NAME: Arson
${ModID}:Arson.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you have a Frost, remove it to Channel a ${ModID}:Frostfire and gain 1 Focus.

${ModID}:ColdStorage.NAME: Cold Storage
${ModID}:ColdStorage.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, you may choose a card in hand to ${ModID}:Freeze.
${ModID}:ColdStorage.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the end of your turn, you may choose a card in hand to ${ModID}:Freeze.

${ModID}:FlashFreeze.NAME: Flash Freeze
${ModID}:FlashFreeze.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${ModID}:Freeze a card in hand.

${ModID}:Plunge.NAME: Plunge
${ModID}:Plunge.DESCRIPTION: Channel and Evoke a Frost without removing it.
${ModID}:Plunge.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Channel and Evoke a Frost without removing it. NL Channel a Frost.

${ModID}:Prime.NAME: Prime
${ModID}:Prime.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Orb slots. NL Exhaust any Status or Curse cards in hand, then ${ModID}:Freeze the rest.

${ModID}:FrozenSnack.NAME: Frozen Snack
${ModID}:FrozenSnack.DESCRIPTION: Add a *Snack to your hand and ${ModID}:Freeze it. NL Exhaust.
${ModID}:FrozenSnack.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a *Snack+ to your hand and ${ModID}:Freeze it. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Snack.NAME: Snack
${ModID}:Snack.DESCRIPTION: Heal !M! HP. NL Gain 1 Focus, 1 Orb Slot, 1 Strength, and 1 Dexterity.

${ModID}:Hailstorm.NAME: Hailstorm
${ModID}:Hailstorm.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times. NL Channel !M! Frost.
